overview: A man named Coda emerges from the men's room of a dive and hits on a woman at the bar who's wearing a slinky red dress. She puts him down and he moves to a corner of the bar, muttering about squirrels. The bartender, a gay man named Pixy, talks to her; she's Evey. She notices a man sitting by himself and she makes her move. Later, she steps to the door for a cigarette. Are circumstances going to bring Coda back into the picture?
title: Man Alive
